Package main

Class CitizenList

java.lang.Object
main.CitizenList
public class CitizenList extends Object
This class store a ObjectsList for the citizens that populate the map. Only work with Man objects.
Author:
Fernando Tarrino del Pozo (FernandoEsra)
See Also:
  • Man
  • Money

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ObjectsList
    citizenList
     

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CitizenList()
    The empty constructor initialize the ObjectsList to a new empty ObjectsList and the IDs attribute to 1.
    Because of that every time that a new citizen is created its possible to control the ids.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Money
    actualMoney()
    This method is used on the createX(board) methods to determine how much money have the new citizens.
    void
    addAllCitizensToMap(Board board)
    This method read all the citizenList and add, in random valid positions, the citizens to the map.
    Important: This method add all the citizens to the map.
    void
    addLastCitizen(Board board)
    This method add the last citizen of the citizenList to a random valid position of the board.
    Money
    aleatoricMoney()
    This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens with random amount of money between 1 and 100.

  • Field Details

    • citizenList

      public ObjectsList citizenList

  • Constructor Details

    • CitizenList

      public CitizenList()
      The empty constructor initialize the ObjectsList to a new empty ObjectsList and the IDs attribute to 1.
      Because of that every time that a new citizen is created its possible to control the ids.

  • Method Details

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      This method return the citizenList.length
      Returns:
      The amount of citizens in the list.

    • addAllCitizensToMap

      public void addAllCitizensToMap(Board board)
      This method read all the citizenList and add, in random valid positions, the citizens to the map.
      Important: This method add all the citizens to the map. If only wants to add one it is necessary to use the method addLastCitizen().
      Parameters:
      board - The map to fill.

    • addLastCitizen

      public void addLastCitizen(Board board)
      This method add the last citizen of the citizenList to a random valid position of the board.
      Parameters:
      board - The map where to place the last citizen of the citizenList.

    • searchForCitizen

      public Object searchForCitizen(int ID)
      Search in the citizenList for one citizen with a specifies ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - A int to search
      Returns:
      If the citizen with the ID are on the list, return that citizen

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getInfoID

      public String getInfoID(int ID)
      Search for the Man.toString() of a citizen consulting for the ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - A int to search
      Returns:
      If the citizen with the ID are on the list, return that citizen.toString. Only work with Man objects. If the ID not exists return an empty String.

    • getCitizenID

      public int getCitizenID(Man search)
      Search for the ID of one citizen.
      Parameters:
      search - The Man object for witch the ID is to be obtained.
      Returns:
      If the citizen exists on the citizenList, return is ID. If not, return 0.

    • createAll

      public void createAll(int total)

    • createFarmer

      public void createFarmer(int amount)
      This method create 'x' amount of Farmers and adds them to the citizenList. Important: This method only create the objects and add them to the citizenList, does not add them to the map. To add the citizens it is necessary to use the methods addCitizensToMap(board) or addLastCitizen(board).

      The money of the new citizen its set in the actualMoney() method.

      Parameters:
      amount - Hoy many Farmers want to create.

    • createButcher

      public void createButcher(int amount)
      This method create 'x' amount of Butchers and adds them to the citizenList. Important: This method only create the objects and add them to the citizenList, does not add them to the map. To add the citizens it is necessary to use the methods addCitizensToMap(board) or addLastCitizen(board).

      The money of the new citizen its set in the actualMoney() method.

      Parameters:
      amount - Hoy many Butchers want to create.

    • createCarpenter

      public void createCarpenter(int amount)

    • actualMoney

      public Money actualMoney()
      This method is used on the createX(board) methods to determine how much money have the new citizens. There are tow methods to controll the ranges. zeroMoney() to set the amount to 0 and aleatoricMoney() to set the money between 1 and 100.
      Returns:
      A new Money object with a defined amount attribute.

    • zeroMoney

      public Money zeroMoney()
      This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens without money.
      Returns:
      A new Money object with 0 value on the amount attribute.

    • aleatoricMoney

      public Money aleatoricMoney()
      This method is used in actualMoney() to create new citizens with random amount of money between 1 and 100.
      Returns:
      A new Money object with a random value between 1 and 100 on the amount attribute.
